FIRST First best friend: Katie Cross. (That day at the bus stop) First car: 93 cavi' ...good as.. new First screen name: Sweetstuff46646... still standing First self purchased album: Eminem: "The slim shady Lp" (6th grader.. wow) First good one: ... same First funeral: An unknown uncle of mine. First pets: Meet Sassy... she still lives. First true love: Looking forward to that. First enemy: Gerrette, the red head. Though he wasn't much of an enemy more of an annoyance. First musician you remember hearing in your house? Kc and the sunshine band. LASTS Last car ride: Phil dropped me off last night. Last library book checked out: Oxford University (Sounds Interesting, eh?) Last movie seen: Dodgeball. Last beverage drank: Natural Spring Water: Sodium Free. Last food consumed: Garden Salad from Burger King. Last phone call: Marty Bender called about an Awning. (Joy) Last time showered: 7/22/04 7:08a.m. Last CD played: Kanye West: College Dropout Last item bought: Garden Salad from Burgar King. Last annoyance: The joys of working for your familie's business AND knowing you get to go camping with them for another weekend. Last disappointment: Grand Prix GTP (down the drain) Last website visited: My xanga. (So self-centered) Last word you said: Ok. Last song you sang: Spaceship Whats under your bed: Electric Keyboard, Remote control boat, Inflatable Cow What time did you wake up today: 6:50am... hit the snooze until 7:10am FUTURE Who are you planning on marrying: Sheesh? because I know... What will you name your kids: Faren II (In all actuality, I don't know) Where are you going to live: Somewhere near the east coast. I'll prolly remain in Michigan. How many kids do you want: 2 What kind of car: Eclipse Spyder. Manual. Black. Convertable. CURRENTS Current mood: Anxious Current taste: Spearmint Current hair: Wild Pony-Tail-Thingy. Current desktop picture: South Padre Beach W/ Seagull included. Favorite artist: Hah! Botero! Current color of toenails: Natural Current hate: No Hate. RANDOM My name is: Faren I feel: Like I don't want to go up to Lake City tonight. In the morning I: Eat Cereal. I like to sleep: During the day. If I could be doing anything right now I'd: Run. Money is: Comin' in. One thing I wish I had is: A new car that won't ignite. All I need is: Eclipse spearmint gum If an angel flew into my window at night I would: Be startled, then releived. If a demon crashed into my window I would: Cry and shake. Something I need but I don't really want is: Fiber. I am afraid of: Failure. RANDOM PART I What color would your soul be: Green. Why do they lock gas station bathrooms: Killers. Can you resist things easily: No. You think red meat is bad for you: Looks bad. Tastes good when cooked. What do you think of life: Unpredictable Do you have a significant other: I wish. Are you happy with the gender you were born with: Yes and No. Are you even-tempered: Huh? When did you learn to whistle: When I grew lips. Is the glass half empty or half full: Half full, but after sitting in the sun too long, half empty, but then I realize it was full all along. If the world ended and you were the only survivor: Enjoy it. Then lack social skills and ask none-but rhetorical questions. If you found someone who looked just like you:"cool". If you found out the life you're living is all a dream: I'd feel lost. You shrunk a foot shorter in the night: Shout with joy, then go buy all the cool clothes I never could wear! You grew a foot taller in the night: Pout to myself. You had to save the world: That's alot of pressure. What's the problem with People: They don't care. Life: Unpredictable Your country: Rocks. DOES The world suck: Now-a-days yes. Britney Spears turn you on: I like her music. Other than that. Can't say she comes close. Life on other planets exist: Yes. The world revolve around you: Sometime I act like it does, but it really doesn't and shouldn't. DO YOU AGREE THAT A picture is worth a thousand words: Mmm Hmm Mmm Hmm! A penny saved is a penny earned: Sha. I guess. It is earned. But it ain't worth much. Only the good die young: Wrrrrd. Abortion is wrong: Yes. DO YOU Take life seriously: Not usually. Suffer from identity crisis: ...I've found myself. Do drugs: Tried a few things. Not a constant Drug-doer. Know anyone psychic: Heavans no. Like school: I did. Lie a lot: No, if i do, it's minor non-important lies. Ex. "Do I look fat?" Believe you know the person who you will marry: Not a chance. Like yourself: 90% of the time. 10% I have doubts. Talk in your sleep: Talk - no. Mumble - Yes. ARE YOU Paranoid: Can be under the right circumstances. Indifferent: Sometimes. (Hah!) Beautiful: Sure. Lonely: At times. Cool: Define cool. Reliable: 98% reliable. Outgoing: Very. Shy: Depends on the situation and people. Romantic: Hah. I could be. In the shower. Sensitive: Yes. Stubborn: Often RANDOM PART III Eye color: Green? Hair color: Light brown, I hear there's a glimpse of "red" tint to it. I don't see the red tint. Ever dyed your hair: Never in my life. Actually soon I will. Height: 5â€™9" Do you have glasses: Do I have glasses? Yes. Do I wear my Glasses? No. Do I wear my contacts? Yes. Do they do any justice? No. Have any pets: Cat - Sassy If you could do anything without consequences, what would it be: Say exactly how I feel all the time. Name something that comes in threes: Haha.. Me and the other two . FINISH THE SENTANCE A day without sunshine is: Depressing. If at first you don't succeed: Try, Try, Try again. If at first you do succeed: Rejoice. You know you should wake up when: Your nose starts to bleed. Honk if: You can drive. If you keep your feet firmly on the ground: You can't go anywhere. I hope you'd still love me if: I lost both arms. EITHER OR McDonalds or Burger King: Bk have it your way. Love or Lust: Love! Paper or Plastic: Paper. Never: Be fake. Give me: You're heart. It's never too late to: Be happy.

It's always fun to slave away at work. Though what I do is hardly slave labor. It's hardly labor at all which is why I want to lay down. My right ear is deaf. My left eye is blind. I'm only have hear. (hah) I'm only half "HERE". Goshy. Guess Ha-What? It is the day of Thursday, and i'm guessing you all know what that means! (Oh wait. You don't. Neither do i.) I could go for some apple pie right now, or cherry for that matter. I knew you knew that. I wish i knew. I'm clueless at the moment. Waiting for answers. I should know why the sky is blue but I don't. That can be answered though, as can everything else. I think I'm going to change my name to "Far a n". It seems that spelling it with the double "a" makes more sense in the long run. Even though the name spelt that way is pronounced quite differently. What do I know, I always accent the wrong letters. It's a different perspective. I don't see many people asking "Karen's" if they spell their name "Kar a n". There should be zero problems, and maybe only 1 error. Error: Bewilderment. I'm going to marry Blogger and maybe have a child named Frogger. He's going to be a computer programmer. He's all about digetalness. He'll pass up dreamcast and game cube. He'll invent his own domain. Then teleport into the circuits. I hear the electric flow feels nice. Maybe if I fall, I'll be held back for a little-tiny bit. Or if a dog attacks my ankles. Who would wish that upon theirselves? Not Me!
